Pre-Game Insights: India has already defeated Pakistan in the Super 12 match, by four wickets on 23 October.
India's opening batsmen KL Rahul, Virat Kohli, Suryakumar Yadav are in form, while key bowlers Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Arshdeep Singh and Mohd Shami do look to manage any conditions.
England's Captain Jos Buttler and Alex Hales have been the source of most of the runs for the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: According to experts, the weather in Adelaide Oval will be partly cloudy in Adelaide on Thursday, however, with no chances of rain, there will be a full game without any disruption.
Others: The India Vs England T20 World Cup, Semi Final match begins at 1:30 PM IST. In India, the match will be broadcast on the Star Sports Network. Online viewers can follow the live action via Disney+Hotstar.
